messages.title: Stephen Williams has a 20 year record of action for our area
messages.content: Stephen has worked tirelessly to bring jobs and apprenticeships to Bristol, and to support new homes in the city.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure mental health is treated equally to physical health.

issues.economy: After a decade of Labour locally and nationally Bristol’s schools were bottom of the national league tables. They failed to regulate the banks and put our economy at risk.
issues.education: Stephen won the money to ensure that every local child has a place in school.
issues.environment: Ensured new homes will be zero carbon from 2016.
issues.health: The £8bn experts say the NHS needs to survive. Lib Dems will ensure mental health is treated equally to physical health.
issues.socialWelfare: The Green Party proposal to give everyone in the country a weekly handout - including millionaires - will cut benefits for the poorest and hugely raise taxes for middle earners.

housing.content: Stephen has worked tirelessly to support new homes in the city.

politicalExperience.achievements: Strengthened rights for tenants and ensured new homes will be zero carbon from 2016.

images.caption: Stephen Williams and supporters with Shelter campaign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Only the Lib Dems are committed to finding the £8bn experts say the NHS needs to survive. Lib Dems will ensure mental health is treated equally to physical health.
